articles.author: Carla K. Johnson
articles.title: A new variant of COVID-19 may be driving up cases in some parts of the world, WHO says - AP News
articles.description: A new variant of COVID-19 is circulating in parts of the world and may be driving an increase in cases in the eastern Mediterranean, Southeast Asia and western Pacific regions. The World Health Organization said Wednesday the new variant called NB.1.8.1 is in…
articles.content: COVID-19 cases are rising again as a new variant begins to circulate in some parts of the world. The World Health Organization said Wednesday the rise in cases is primarily in the eastern Mediterrane… [+1392 chars]
